動物用藥品名稱: 全保狂犬病不活化疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 犬、貓、馬、牛、綿羊：預防狂犬病。
ingredients: INACTIVATED RABIES VIRUS ANTIGEN, AT LEAST............1 NIH RELATIVE POTENCYPENICILLIN, AT MOST..................30 IUAMPHOTERICIN B, AT MOST.......30 MCGMERTHIOLATE (THIMEROSAL), AT MOST......1:10000Rabies virus, PV-11 strain, before inactivation the titer is atleast.......10^5.0 TCID50/ML
